title: anger
comment: A state of indignation and outrage, often resulting from distress caused by injustice or insult. Scripture affirms God's righteous anger against sin and urges moderation in regard to human anger.

children.title: anger, divine
children.comment: The anger of God is directed against all human sin, disobedience, rebellion and wickedness, which threaten to thwart his purposes for his creation and people.

children.title: The characteristics of God that provoke his anger
He is also compassionate and slow to anger
Being saved from the anger of God
God's anger cannot be averted by human means
God's anger is averted on account of his love for believers
God's anger is averted on account of the work of Jesus Christ
anger, human
children.comment: Human anger arises for a number of reasons, some of which are acceptable and others which are not. Scripture stresses the potentially destructive aspects of human anger and urges moderation.

primaryrefs.comment: Hanani had prophesied against the king.
